description: This file is a shell script designed to manage the startup and setup of a MongoDB server, including checking for existing instances, starting MongoDB with specific parameters, creating users, and generating connection details.

methods.name: mongosh
methods.description: MongoDB shell command used for executing database commands and queries, used extensively in this script to check status, create users, and perform setup tasks.

calls: for i in {1..15}; do if mongosh --port ${DB_PORT} --eval "db.adminCommand('ping')"; done
